name: Shinobido 2: Revenge of Zen
description:
Shinobido 2: Revenge of Zen is an action game developed by Acquire. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Shinobido 2: Revenge of Zen has a score of 55. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Shinobido 2: Revenge of Zen is available on PS Vita.
Yasuhiro Abe directed the game. Toshiko Tasaki scored the game.
